translations: 用湿海绵擦洗；（非正式）白吃白拿（sponge 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He spent his life sponging off his relatives.
sentences.translation: 他靠在众亲属那儿蹭吃蹭喝过了一辈子。

sentences.sentence: He should just get an honest job and stop sponging off the rest of us!
sentences.translation: 他就应该找一份踏实的工作，不要再揩我们其他人的油了！

sentences.sentence: Sponging and taking more than one's share and extravagance and waste on the part of cadres must be banned.
sentences.translation: 杜绝干部多吃多占和铺张浪费。
